basis: The latest turn outlines a plan to perform the snack and upgrade actions but contains no evidence of actual eating or logging yet.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict or contradictory messages; user acknowledges BED and commits to a small, doable plan.
negative_thought_patterns: No persistent self-blame or hopeless language detected; occasional framing of BED as a tricky obstacle but not a negative self-assessment.
emotional_triggers: Evening-related stress and BED cravings referenced as primary triggers for difficulty.
coaching_notes: Maintain warm, nonjudgmental tone; reinforce tiny, low-friction steps; encourage brief post-action reflection and logging of what helped or was hard; continue cue-based environmental tweaks and a simple hunger-check routine; monitor for rising guilt or binge urges and adjust pacing accordingly.
